description: DJ is a sailor looking for some hot action before heading back to sea. He finds the beautiful Natassia by the dock. Little did he know that the pretty lady has a price and a mean boss. Tyler shows up in full leather to make DJ pay... in one way or another. Since DJ is flat broke, Tyler decides to take it out on trade. Tyler ties up the sailor and have his way with him. DJ endures bondage, flogging, hard fucking, and the biggest cumshot in his life.
title: The Sailor
